name: revengine
description: RevEngine is an open source Data Management Platform for news publishers wanting to leverage their reader and content data

scripts.prod-fork:api: env NODE_ENV=production env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 node packages/api
scripts.prod-track:crosswords: env NODE_ENV=production env TRACKER_NAME=crosswords TRACKER_KAFKA_TOPIC=crosswords INDEX=crosswords env PORT=4015 env TRACKER_HOST='127.0.0.1' tsx watch -- packages/tracker/event_tracker.ts
scripts.dev-track:crosswords: env NODE_ENV=development env TRACKER_NAME=crosswords TRACKER_KAFKA_TOPIC=crosswords INDEX=crosswords env PORT=3015 env TRACKER_HOST='127.0.0.1' tsx watch -- packages/tracker/event_tracker.ts
scripts.dev-track-test:event_tracker: env NODE_ENV=development env TRACKER_NAME=event_tracker_test env TRACKER_KAFKA_TOPIC=event_tracker_test INDEX=event_tracker_test env PORT=5015 npx jest --forceExit packages/tracker/test/event_tracker.test.ts
scripts.dev:api: env NODE_ENV=development env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 nodemon --inspect --verbose --watch packages/api packages/api
scripts.dev:listeners: env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch packages/mailer --watch packages/listeners packages/listeners

author: Jason Norwood-Young <jason@10layer.com>
